prompts: Create a small, yellow Pokémon with a cheerful demeanor and red accents on its body.
I want a ghostly Pokémon that has playful traits and resembles a cute bell.
Generate a Pokémon design that is primarily yellow with a whimsical, musical theme.
Make a tiny Pokémon with a round body and vibrant colors that evoke happiness.
Imagine a Pokémon that can be found in urban settings and has a playful personality.
Design a creature that has bell-like features and is known for its enchanting sound.
Show me a Pokémon that thrives in forests and has a unique mix of yellow and red colors.
